section.section: The Advisory Council shall recommend that the Department establish guidelines for the effective management and treatment of heart disease and stroke.

text.section: A State or county health department that carries out heart disease and stroke prevention, education, and treatment programs shall conform to the guidelines established under subsection (a) of this section.

Once every 2 years, the Advisory Council shall:
Evaluate heart disease and stroke prevention, education, and treatment programs; and
Send the evaluation with a report to the Governor.
